title: Museum Docent
description:
Share your passion for art and culture as a volunteer docent at our city's premier art museum. Docents lead tours, provide information about exhibits, and enhance visitors' museum experience through education and engagement.

This volunteer role is ideal for art enthusiasts who enjoy public speaking and want to help make art accessible and meaningful to diverse audiences.
responsibilities:
Lead guided tours for visitors of various ages and backgrounds
Learn about current and permanent exhibitions
Answer visitor questions about artwork and the museum
Assist with special events and educational programs
Provide a welcoming presence in gallery spaces
requirements:
Strong interest in art and culture (formal art education not required)
Excellent communication and public speaking skills
Availability during museum hours, including some weekends
Willingness to complete docent training program (provided)
Minimum 1-year commitment after training
Professional demeanor and appearance
benefits:
Comprehensive training in art history and museum education
Private exhibition previews and behind-the-scenes access
Discount at museum shop and cafe
Invitations to special events and lectures
Ongoing learning opportunities with curators and artists
